lead_paragraph: Army officials consider the nation's retailers the "key" factor in the campaign which is about to start to promote early mailing of Christmas packages to members of the armed forces overseas, it was pointed out yesterday at a meeting sponsored by the War Advertising Council and attended by trade editors and department store and advertising executives.
abstract: War Ad Council meets with trade eds and dept store and ad execs to promote campaign for early Xmas package mailing to mil forces overseas
